short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly copy & paste accented letters and symbols from a variety of languages!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to easily and effortlessly copy and paste accented letters and symbols from a variety of languages (currently Spanish, French, German, Romanian, Dutch, and Portuguese)!
Need to easily type languages mentioned above for your work, school, or anywhere else around the web? This extension is perfect for you. 
There are many accented letters and special symbols that can be copied and used from a variety of languages.

Changelog:
v6.6 - Submitted Jun. 8, 2023
- Added Romanian, Dutch, Portuguese

v6.5 - Submitted: Oct. 2, 2022
- Fixed bug where extension made all pages use Arial Font
